title: Camera shows I'm tilted but I'm not (Gyro sensor issue)
content:
Hi all,
  I recently flashed my Pixel 3a XL using stock image and Android Flash Tool from https://developers.google.com/android/images 

  Before I flashed my phone, there's nothing wrong when I took photos. But after I flashed it, I found it weird that even though I'm not tilted, the camera app says I'm tilted. If I tilt the phone, it says I'm not tilted.




  I have already tried reboot, reboot into safe mode, uninstall camera app update and reinstall the update, none of them fix the issue.

  And I also use the "bubble level" tool in Google search, it shows my phone is tilted. Unless I lived in a house that's tilted for 20 years and I never noticed, there's definitely something wrong.

What can I do to fix it? 


Thanks
